events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on a rainy day causing significant damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after verifying the initial description of the vehicle collision.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the customer's case in order to ensure timely follow-up and assistance.
The customer was notified that their claim has been acknowledged and the investigation process will begin shortly.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photographs and the official police report for review.
The investigation into the vehicle collision has officially started to verify the details provided by the claimant.
The investigation confirmed the cause of damage and validated all submitted documents as authentic and accurate.
A settlement proposal was sent to the claimant based on repair cost estimates and coverage limits in the policy.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the prompt communication from the assigned agent.
The claim approval was finalized following customer acceptance of the settlement and verification of all claim details.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account covering the agreed amount for vehicle repairs as per the settlement.
The claim was officially closed after payment disbursement and confirmation that the claimant had no further questions.
All documentation and case files were archived according to company policy for future reference and record-keeping.
